item.title: GA announcement— Microsoft Purview Canada East
item.description:
Today, we're announcing the General Availability of Microsoft Purview in Canada East.
As part of our ongoing commitment to expanding our global reach and providing Microsoft Purview to our customers, we have diligently worked hard for months to bring Purview to Canada East.
This expansion will allow our customers in the Canada East region access unified data governance solutions allowing them to manage, govern, and protect their entire data estate.
These governance solutions are accessible through the Microsoft Purview governance portal, which provides tools to enable your organization ...
